trans-unit.source: Contains methods and fields for UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Módszerek és Felhasználófelület-automatizálási ügyfélalkalmazások mezőket tartalmaz.

trans-unit.source: Registers a method that handles [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: Regisztrálja a módszere, amely kezeli a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] események.

trans-unit.source: Some classes, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>, expose fields identifying events that are specific to the class.
trans-unit.target: Néhány osztályok, például <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>teszi közzé a mezők kifejezetten az osztály az események azonosítása,</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>

trans-unit.source: The AddAutomationEventHandler method provides a mechanism that enables you to register handlers for these events.
trans-unit.target: A AddAutomationEventHandler metódus, amely lehetővé teszi, hogy ezek az események kezelők regisztrálni mechanizmust biztosít.

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`a metódus vagy a metódus egy hivatkozást egy példánya lehet (`AddressOf` a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the event the method will handle.
trans-unit.target: A következő eseményhez: a metódus azonosítóját fogja kezelni.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to associate with the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemben társítja az eseménykezelő.

trans-unit.source: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.
trans-unit.target: A hatókör események kezelendő; Ez azt jelenti, hogy azok csatlakoznak-e a maga az elem, vagy az olyan elődjének és leszármazottai.

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the specified event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A metódus hívására az adott esemény bekövetkezésekor.

trans-unit.source: Registers a method that will handle focus-changed events.
trans-unit.target: Regisztrálja a fókusz megváltozott események kezelésére metódus.

trans-unit.source: Focus-changed events are system-wide; you cannot set a narrower scope.
trans-unit.target: Fókusz megváltozott események olyan rendszerszintű; Szűkebb körű nem állítható be.

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`a metódus vagy a metódus egy hivatkozást egy példánya lehet (`AddressOf` a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A metódus hívására az esemény akkor következik be.

trans-unit.source: Registers a method that will handle property-changed events.
trans-unit.target: Regisztrálja a metódus, tulajdonság megváltozásakor események kezelésére.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item specified by the supplied [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element might not support the properties specified by the `properties` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elem a megadott által megadott [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem nem támogatja a megadott tulajdonságok a `properties` paraméter.

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`a metódus vagy a metódus egy hivatkozást egy példánya lehet (`AddressOf` a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element with which to associate the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] az eseménykezelő társítandó elemet.

trans-unit.source: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and children.
trans-unit.target: A hatókör események kezelendő; Ez azt jelenti, hogy azok a maga az elem, vagy az olyan elődjének és gyermekei.

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A metódus hívására az esemény akkor következik be.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] properties of interest.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] érdeklődési tulajdonságait.

trans-unit.source: Registers the method that will handle structure-changed events.
trans-unit.target: Regisztrálja a metódus struktúra megváltozott események kezelésére.

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`a metódus vagy a metódus egy hivatkozást egy példánya lehet (`AddressOf` a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element with which to associate the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] az eseménykezelő társítandó elemet.

trans-unit.source: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.
trans-unit.target: A hatókör események kezelendő; Ez azt jelenti, hogy azok csatlakoznak-e a maga az elem, vagy az olyan elődjének és leszármazottai.

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the structure-changed event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A metódus hívására, hogy a struktúra megváltozott esemény akkor következik be.

trans-unit.source: Compares two integer arrays containing run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] to determine whether their content is the same.
trans-unit.target: Összehasonlít két egész tömb futásidejű tartalmazó [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] meghatározásához. a tartalom azonos.

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), Compare throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Ha bármelyik argumentum értéke null hivatkozást (`Nothing` a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), hasonlítsa össze a jelez egy <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>kivétel.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The first run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to compare.
trans-unit.target: Az első futásidejű [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] összehasonlítani.

trans-unit.source: The second run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to compare.
trans-unit.target: A második futásidejű [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] összehasonlítani.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the compared run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az összehasonlított futásidejű [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] Ugyanez vonatkozik [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elem; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements, returning <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Összehasonlít két [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemek visszaadó <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Ha mindkét azonos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elem.

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Ha bármelyik argumentum értéke null hivatkozást (`Nothing` a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A>jelez egy <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>kivétel.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the equality operator for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer megegyezik a egyenlőség műveletet a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>objektumok.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: The first [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.
trans-unit.target: Az első [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem összehasonlítani.

trans-unit.source: The second [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.
trans-unit.target: A második [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem összehasonlítani.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the run time identifiers of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements are the same; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a futási idő azonosítói a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemek azonosak; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that can contain content.
trans-unit.target: Előre definiált jelöli a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tartalmazó csak fában [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tartalmat tartalmazó elemeket.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are controls.
trans-unit.target: Előre definiált jelöli a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tartalmazó csak fában [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] vezérlők elemeket.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of the specified control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a megadott vezérlő minta neve.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő mintát azonosítóját.

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the control pattern, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified pattern is not found.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő mintát, vagy egy null hivatkozás rövid nevét (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) Ha a megadott minta nem található.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property.
trans-unit.target: A megadott nevét [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tulajdonság.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property identifier of the named property.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tulajdonságazonosító nevű tulajdonság.

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property is not found.
trans-unit.target: A rövid nevét a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tulajdonság, vagy egy null hivatkozás (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) Ha a megadott [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tulajdonság nem található.

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: Előre definiált jelöli a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tartalmazó összes fában [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemek.

trans-unit.source: Used by itself, this condition is functionally identical to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>.
trans-unit.target: Önmagában történő használata, ez az állapot esetén gyakorlatilag azonos <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Removes all registered [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja az összes regisztrált [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] eseménykezelők.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a megadott [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] eseménykezelő.

trans-unit.source: An event identifier.
trans-unit.target: Esemény azonosítója.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element on which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem, amikor eltávolítja az eseménykezelő.

trans-unit.source: The handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*> for the specified event identifier and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Az eseménykezelő metódus számára átadott <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*>a megadott esemény azonosítójának és [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified focus-changed event handler.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a megadott fókusz megváltozott eseménykezelő.

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a focus-changed event handler being added and removed.
trans-unit.target: Az alábbi példakód mutatja, hogy a fókusz megváltozott esemény kezelő éppen felvétele, illetve eltávolítása.

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#102](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#102)] [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#102](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#102)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[#102 UIAClient_snip](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#102)][!code-cs[UIAClient_snipf ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#102)]

trans-unit.source: A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*>
trans-unit.target: Egy számára átadott leíró metódus<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified property-changed event handler.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a megadott tulajdonság megváltozásakor eseménykezelő.

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a property-changed event handler being added and removed.
trans-unit.target: Az alábbi példakód mutatja, hogy egy tulajdonság megváltozásakor esemény kezelő éppen felvétele, illetve eltávolítása.

trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[#172 UIAClient_snip](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/PropertySnips.cs#172)][!code-vb[UIAClient_snip¬ ](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/PropertySnips.vb#172)]

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem, amelyből az eseménykezelő eltávolítása.

trans-unit.source: A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*> for the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: A leíró metódus számára átadott <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*>a megadott [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified structure-changed event handler.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a megadott struktúra megváltozott eseménykezelő.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem, amelyből az eseménykezelő eltávolítása.

trans-unit.source: A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*> for the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: A leíró metódus számára átadott <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*>a megadott [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*>
